Nice ID Chris!

Note: It appears Nitro changed their masthead to the following, which is [Bodoni Poster Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20091109042013/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/poster-bodoni/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D66%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DNitro%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D30)
